page.title: 07Industry - Castle Kennedy
page.content:
{Shell Oil Depot.}Supplies local farms and domestic users. There are eleven tanks each holding 50,000 litres.Seven tanks are for diesel, three are for heating oil and three are for lorry diesel. There is a manager,salesman and two drivers.
{Engineering.}The Owner, single handed as a rule, makes iron goods - gates, etc.He constructs lorries, trailers, horseboxes and he fits engines.
{Furniture Factory.}Site on old airfield.Furniture is mass produced by computer controlled machines.Kitchen and bedroom furniture mostly.Carving turning and general joinery done to special order.Five people work here.
